companyInfo.Competitors: Continental, Delphi, FCA Fiat Chrysler Automobiles

jobDescription: Company DescriptionDo you want beneficial technologies being shaped by your ideas? Whether in the areas of mobility solutions, consumer goods, industrial technology or energy and building technology - with us, you will have the chance to improve quality of life all across the globe. Welcome to Bosch.Job DescriptionOur team is responsible for producing product catalogs.  As an Associate Marketing Data Analyst, you will work closely with marketing, and data management teams. You will be responsible for Researching features and attributes of vehicles in the US, Canada and MexicoCreating and maintaining accurate vehicle informationSourcing, validating and updating vehicle population dataCalculating market coverage and identifying application gapsGathering, validating and maintaining product application information from internal and external sourcesProducing application catalogs, validating and delivering to internal and external customersEnsuring the quality of data and preventing errors in dataQualificationsBachelors in Automotive Technology, Engineering, or Business degree0-3 years of experience in Automotive Industry, preferably automotive aftermarketSelf learner, ability to work independently with minimal supervisionVery good analytical skillsExpert in MS Excel and MS Access Additional InformationAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
